page.title: 15Education in Hurworth
page.content: Education can begin at 3 yrs.The Methodist and Grange playgroup take children from 3 till they start school.Both hold 2 hour sessions every week day morning for a maximum of 20 children, fee 75p per session.Rising 5 yrs, the children go to Hurworth Junior and Infant School (29 pupils) which reamalgamated in 1982 and occupies 2 buildings on adjoining sites.Children are transported from outlying districts.At 11 yrs most children go to Hurworth Comprehensive School (605 pupils).Some will go to the R.C Secondary School (Darlington) and some to private schools.A few boys attend the local Boys' Preparatory School for 4-13 year olds.They leave the Comprehensive School at 16.Last year out of 125 pupils 59 moved to further educations but the majority joined Youth Training Schemes.
